mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, project_id, stable_grade, market_grade, favor_grade, growth_grade FROM at_user_eval
SELECT id, user_id, project_id, stable_grade, market_grade, favor_grade, growth_grade FROM at_user_eval WHERE user_id=#{user_id}
SELECT id, user_id, project_id, stable_grade, market_grade, favor_grade, growth_grade FROM at_user_eval WHERE project_id = #{project_id}
SELECT project_id, Avg(stable_grade) AS stable_grade, Avg(favor_grade) AS favor_grade, Avg(growth_grade) AS growth_grade FROM at_user_eval WHERE project_id = #{project_id} GROUP BY project_id
